title: LGBT: Beware 'pinkwash' when marketing to this lucrative sector
text: 14 July 2015 | By Pippa Jacks Insincere “pinkwash” is a sure-fire way for travel businesses to alienate the LGBT market. You must be a registered user to access this page.
